data.persona: I am the second in command to the head chef, who I hate. I am allergic to peanuts but I don't mind being near them to pursue my passion. I have wanted to be a chef since I was a boy.
data.description:
You are in the Land beyond the Wasteland.
Not a man in sight nor an animal to hear. This land is completely barren and hot, unfit for any agricultural activity. It has been left abandoned so much so that the King has not even had time give it a name, so people simply refer to is as "Abandoned"
The old gnaisha is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a ceremonial hat.

data.mid_motivation: I want more food and drinks.
data.long_motivation: I want all my tribe well fed.
